name: Lil' Maji Mage
desc: During the Main Phase, if this card is in your hand (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 Cyberse monster or Link Monster; Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "Lil' Maji Mage" once per turn. Gains ATK equal to the total Link Ratings of all Link Monsters in your GY x 400.
